entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: -19.4°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -22.2°C
Wind: NNE 35 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
